name: Tales of Berseria™ - Adventure Item Pack 1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 3.0GHz or AMD Phenom II X2 550, 3.1GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800 GTX or AMD Radeon HD 4850
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 3.0GHz or AMD Phenom II X2 550, 3.1GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 or Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible

esrb.descriptors: Violence, Blood, Mild Language, Mild Suggestive Themes, Partial Nudity, Use of Alcohol

short_description: Catalog 1 Bonus: An item pack for all budding adventurers! (Pack number 1)
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support
